Pakura combines several of her [[Scorch Release: Extremely Steaming Murder|flaming orbs]] to create a single massive one, which then violently explodes with enough force and power to incinerate a large area around it. When this happens, steam can be seen emitting from the area.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the anime, the technique was given a proper name in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Blazing]]''.
